name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Field Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance solutions in the healthcare sector. Demonstrated expertise in problem-solving and complex system repair, with a strong focus on customer service and preventative maintenance. Adept at diagnosing IT network issues and providing remote support for advanced systems.

Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a solid background in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms designed for predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing through cloud-native solutions deployed on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, aligning solutions with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to enhancing healthcare systems through innovative technology integration.
